name: ATL - Libertad - Toro
additionalNotes: A Nicaraguan puro born of an exclusive partnership with Aganorsa Leaf, winners of dozens of top-25 ratings from Cigar Aficionado magazine, the Libertad is a celebration of the Cuban-seed leaf and production process Eduardo Fernandez began curating more than twenty years ago.  With the inimitable flavor of Aganorsa Corojo wrapper, the Libertad is a medium-full smoke that will help any ATLien to “shake that load off.”  The Libertad offers notes of cashew and oak today, with caramel and raisin flavors developing for those willing to wait 2-3 years. Well-balanced and world-class.
